Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Damen
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Marquette, Ashland, and 69th due to, street blockage at 67th/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Marquette, Ashland, and 69th due to, street blockage at 67th/Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Bryn Mawr. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Bryn Mawr.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.  Allow extra travel time.
